title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8155.46 - Town of Yorktown
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8155.46 - Town of Yorktown

State Regulations
(a) Front

Street. The northbound and southbound roadways of Front Street between the

United Parcel Service terminal and Underhill Avenue, provided that this route
shall only be used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7 a.m. (b) Underhill Avenue. The northbound and
southbound roadways of Underhill Avenue between Front Street and Commerce

Street, provided that this route shall only be used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7 a.m. (c) Commerce Street. The
northbound and southbound roadways of Commerce Street between Underhill Avenue
and Route 35, provided that this route shall only be used between the hours of
7 p.m. and 7 a.m. (d) Route 35. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of Route 35 between Commerce Street and the

Bear Mountain State Parkway, provided that this route shall only be used
between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7 a.m. (e) Kear Street. Kear Street between

Underhill Avenue and Route 118, a distance of 0.2+- mile. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8155.46

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
